unnormalised: Alright folks, buckle up! The sports calendar is jam-packed this year, and keeping track of it all can feel like chasing a runaway auto-rickshaw in peak traffic. But don't worry, I've got you covered with a sneak peek at some key dates and times, all in lovely, unnormalized glory. Get ready to mark those calendars (and maybe set some alarms!).
normalised: Alright folks, buckle up! The sports calendar is jam-packed this year, and keeping track of it all can feel like chasing a runaway auto-rickshaw in peak traffic. But don't worry, I've got you covered with a sneak peek at some key dates and times, all in lovely, unnormalized glory. Get ready to mark those calendars and maybe set some alarms!

unnormalised: First up, cricket! Can’t forget that, right? The much-awaited India vs. Pakistan match in the Asia Cup is tentatively scheduled for 02/09/2024, subject to weather conditions. Keep an eye on the news, though, because you know how things can change last minute. Start time is expected to be around 2:30 PM IST. Then, there’s the IPL, kicking off around 22/03/2025. Expect matches to start either at 4:00 PM or 8:00 PM, doubleheaders are common, so keep an eye out!
normalised: First up, cricket! Can’t forget that, right? The much-awaited India versus Pakistan match in the Asia Cup is tentatively scheduled for second September two thousand and twenty four, subject to weather conditions. Keep an eye on the news, though, because you know how things can change last minute. Start time is expected to be around two thirty P-M I-S-T. Then, there’s the I-P-L, kicking off around twenty second March two thousand and twenty five. Expect matches to start either at four P-M or eight P-M, doubleheaders are common, so keep an eye out!

unnormalised: Moving on to football, for all you ManU and Chelsea fans out there. The ISL final is usually sometime around mid-March, let's say 16/03/2025. That’s just a guesstimate, based on previous years. But most likely it will be broadcasted live at 7:30 PM IST. And of course, we gotta keep an eye on FIFA. World Cup Qualifiers are spread out throughout the year, with crucial matches slated for 15/11/2024 and 20/11/2024. Exact times TBD, but expect them to be in the evening to accommodate prime-time viewing.
normalised: Moving on to football, for all you ManU and Chelsea fans out there. The I-S-L final is usually sometime around mid-March, let's say sixteenth March two thousand and twenty five. That’s just a guesstimate, based on previous years. But most likely it will be broadcasted live at seven thirty P-M I-S-T. And of course, we gotta keep an eye on F-I-F-A. World Cup Qualifiers are spread out throughout the year, with crucial matches slated for fifteenth November two thousand and twenty four and twentieth November two thousand and twenty four. Exact times T-B-D, but expect them to be in the evening to accommodate prime-time viewing.

unnormalised: For the tennis buffs, Wimbledon’s main draw usually starts around late June or early July. Mark your calendars for 24/06/2024 to 07/07/2024. Matches typically start around 11:30 AM GMT, which translates to roughly 5:00 PM IST. That’s perfect chai-time viewing, isn’t it? Also, the Australian Open usually takes place in January. Expect the final around 26/01/2025.
normalised: For the tennis buffs, Wimbledon’s main draw usually starts around late June or early July. Mark your calendars for twenty fourth June two thousand and twenty four to seventh July two thousand and twenty four. Matches typically start around eleven thirty A-M G-M-T, which translates to roughly five P-M I-S-T. That’s perfect chai-time viewing, isn’t it? Also, the Australian Open usually takes place in January. Expect the final around twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty five.

unnormalised: Badminton fans, don’t fret, I haven't forgotten about you! The All England Open Badminton Championships typically happens around March. Tentatively plan for 12/03/2025 to 16/03/2025. The finals are usually played on Sunday afternoon, which would be late Sunday evening India time, approximately 8:30 PM IST. The exact schedule will be announced closer to the date, so prepone that reminder in your calendar!
normalised: Badminton fans, don’t fret, I haven't forgotten about you! The All England Open Badminton Championships typically happens around March. Tentatively plan for twelfth March two thousand and twenty five to sixteenth March two thousand and twenty five. The finals are usually played on Sunday afternoon, which would be late Sunday evening India time, approximately eight thirty P-M I-S-T. The exact schedule will be announced closer to the date, so prepone that reminder in your calendar!

unnormalised: Don't forget the Formula 1 fans! The Indian Grand Prix… well, we’re all still hoping for its return. But till then, keep an eye out for the Singapore Grand Prix. It is slated for around 20/09/2024 to 22/09/2024. It is always a night race, around 8:00 PM local time, which is around 5:30 PM IST.
normalised: Don't forget the Formula one fans! The Indian Grand Prix… well, we’re all still hoping for its return. But till then, keep an eye out for the Singapore Grand Prix. It is slated for around twentieth September two thousand and twenty four to twenty second September two thousand and twenty four. It is always a night race, around eight P-M local time, which is around five thirty P-M I-S-T.

unnormalised: Of course, these are just a few highlights. There's a whole universe of sporting events to explore, from Kabaddi to Hockey to the Olympics! Keep your eyes peeled for more updates and announcements, and remember to double-check the dates and times as the events draw closer, because things can always change, especially given our 'Indian Standard Time' of making last-minute changes! Happy watching!
